column3: There's been an increase {{c1::in}} the amount of traffic using this road.
There are many advantages {{c1::in}} being able to speak a foreign language.
If I give you the camera, can you take a picture {{c1::of}} me?
There has been a sharp rise {{c1::in}} property prices recently.
The company has rejected workers' demands {{c1::for}} a pay rise.
People have less money now and there has been a fall {{c1::in}} their standard of living.
